com.chrismin13.additionsapi.durability

Class ItemDurability

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.chrismin13.additionsapi.durability.ItemDurability
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ArmorDurability, AxeDurability, BowDurability, CarrotStickDurability, ElytraDurability, FishingRodDurability, FlintAndSteelDurability, HoeDurability, PickaxeDurability, ShearDurability, ShieldDurability, SpadeDurability, SwordDurability

    public class ItemDurability
extends java.lang.Object
    This specifies how an item will have its durability reduced when performing certain actions.
    All values default to 0.
    Author:
    chrismin13

        Adds a Special Block.
        Special Blocks will override the BlockBreak and InstantBlockBreak and damage the item.
        Parameters:
